title: Enhancing Business Competencies: Reflective Practice for e-Portfolio Design in Higher Education Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize and analyze over 80% of science experiment data using e-portfolio tools
Through reflective practice journals, learners can identify and propose improvements for errors occurring in science problem-solving processes at least three times
Learners can perform peer feedback exchanges at least twice via a peer assessment system and apply it to portfolio content
Learners can represent their learning process as a three-stage structured map by applying the activity theory framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
